required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Tiradentes Association in the Treatment of Acute Pain
clinical_study.official_title: National, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Triple-dummy, Phase II Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Tiradentes Association in the Treatment of Acute Pain

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Tiradentes association in adolescents and adults with acute pain.

primary_outcome.measure: Time-weighted Sum of Pain Intensity Difference Over 6 Hours (SPID0-6)
primary_outcome.description: Sum of pain intensity differences after 6 hours (SPID0-6), calculated as the weighted sum of pain intensity scale over 6 hours after the dose. Scoring is derived from the 4-point scale, which 0= no pain, 1= mild pain, 2= moderate pain and 4= severe pain.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of adverse events recorded during the study.
